articles.title: Conservative philosopher Roger Scruton dies at 75
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Philosopher Roger Scruton, one of Britain’s most prominent conservative thinkers, has died aged 75.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) Philosopher Roger Scruton, one of Britains most prominent conservative thinkers, has died aged 75.
Scrutons family said in a statement that he died Sunday after a six-month battle with cancer.
